item.description: The Associated General Contractors of America’s (AGC) Young Contractors invite you to join them during the Construction Leadership Council’s Working Weekend from October 30 to November 1. Held at the Millennium Bostonian Hotel, the event includes sessions on everything from crisis management and green construction to conflict resolution and BIM projects under construction. Mingle during a Friday night reception at Ned Devine’s from 6:00 to 7:30 pm, and stay late to celebrate Halloween in all its glory. AIA Learning Units are available. This event is free, but registration is required at http://www.agc.org/wo....
item.name: AGC Young Contractors National Conference
